text: A public interest litigation petition has been filed in the Madras High Court Bench seeking a direction to the State government to implement a system of affixing indelible marks on the body of blood donors to prevent those who give their blood for money. M. Krishnaveni, an advocate, had filed the case claiming that son of one her clients had fallen addict to narcotic drugs and he was selling his blood to get money for buying drugs.
title: ‘Affix indelible mark on blood donors’
